title: Bombay Trilogy
description: At six, she saved her family from dacoits. Now--how will Shiva protect her children from harm they inflict on themselves?Bombay Trilogy follows the fictional Sambashivans through several generations of cultural, personal, and societal change. From the bandit-killing matriarch mentioned above to siblings who rise above the demands of blood, from cousins who marry 'unsuitable' brides to a daughter who adopts an orphan of questionable caste, each character stands at the intersection of freedom and duty while Bombay Trilogy opens into an exploration of cultural identity, personal dharma, and the meaning of home.
author: Cheryl Snell
